[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/cmr_library.c

Handler to keep track of which players know which materials. Allows you to find out which materials a player knows about and add new ones. This is typically used in conjunction with the cmr_handler for materials which the player must be taught about.

See also:
cmr_handler.c

Written by Deutha

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c

add_known_material
int add_known_material(string pname,
string material)
Mark a material as known by a given player.

Parameters:
pname - The name of the player
material - The name of the material
Returns:
Returns 0 if they already knew the material, 1 if they know it now.
